mcq.question: What is the first line of the FBLA creed?
choices: I believe education is the right of every person
I want every person to earn a living at a useful occupation
We want to better the world through education
Learning the skills to succeed in the world is vital
mcq.answer: I believe education is the right of every person

mcq.question: Where was the concept of FBLA developed?
Who is credited as the founder of FBLA?
In what year was the first high school FBLA chapter chartered?
What is the first line of the FBLA Code of Ethics?
choices: I will be honest and sincere
I will work the hardest I can
I will follow the rules and regulations of FBLA and my school
mcq.answer: I will be honest and sincere

Matching.question: Match the following FBLA divisions to their respective school levels
Match the following scholarships FBLA helps to offer with their respective winnings
groupB: up to full tuition for winners

Matching.question: Match the following FBLA divisions to their respective founding year
Match the following levels of the FBLA Business Achievement Awards to when they would be presented to their respective winners
groupB: Presented at a local awards ceremony or FBLA event by advisor

Matching.question: Match the following months to their respective events or importance

groupB: March of Dimes World Prematurity Day
Date by which dues must be received for competition eligibility

Matching.question: Match the following FBLA Community Service Awards to their required number of hours

receive and act as custodian of chapter funds
